name: brad-markov
bradJokes: Even a stopped clock is right twice a day
Even a blind squirrel sometimes finds a nut
Did you hear about the cartoonist that was murdered? Details are sketchy
Someone stole all the toilets at the police station. The cops have nothing to go on
I remember the first time I tried telling a joke
What do you call an alligator that's a detective? An investagator!
Well I'm sorry but this is a Brad impression first and a dev channel second
